articles.author: Cat Zakrzewski, Faiz Siddiqui
articles.title: How Elon Musk’s deputies took over the government’s most basic functions - The Washington Post
articles.description: Elon Musk and his allies are harnessing tech units and other agencies that handle daily federal operations to amass sweeping control of the executive branch.
articles.content: Elon Musks allies are turning a once-obscure federal IT unit into the linchpin of their sweeping campaign to tear down the federal bureaucracy, sparking fears of improper overreach and chaos among te… [+12483 chars]

articles.title: Doctors Warn COVID-19 Could Be a Hidden Trigger for Heart Attacks Long After Recovery - SciTechDaily
articles.description: COVID-19 isn't just a respiratory illness — it can silently attack the heart. New research reveals that the virus accelerates plaque buildup in arteries, increasing the risk of heart attacks and strokes long after recovery. A new study has found that COVID-19…
articles.content: A new study reveals that COVID-19 fuels dangerous plaque buildup in the arteries, making heart attacks and strokes more likely. Even after recovery, the risk remains high, stressing the importance of… [+4845 chars]
